# R Resources {-}

## Time Series R resources {-}

- [Shumway and Stoffer's Textbook](https://www.stat.pitt.edu/stoffer/tsda/) 
- [Fun with ASTSA package](https://github.com/nickpoison/astsa/blob/master/fun_with_astsa/fun_with_astsa.md)

## Spatial resources {-}

- [sf package website](https://r-spatial.github.io/sf/) 
- [Geocomputation with R](https://bookdown.org/robinlovelace/geocompr/spatial-class.html)

## Tidyverse resources {-}

- [Lisa Lendway's COMP/STAT 112 website](https://ds112-lendway.netlify.app/) (with code examples and videos)
- [John's Hopkins Tidyverse course text](https://jhudatascience.org/tidyversecourse/index.html)

## Visualization resources {-}

- [ggplot2 reference](http://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/)
- [Colors in R](http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~tzheng/files/Rcolor.pdf)

- [RStudio cheat sheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/)

- [R Programming Wikibook](http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/R_Programming)

    - [Article](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/205612627-Debugging-with-RStudio)
